wikitext.*:
{{disambig-more|Battle of Five Armies |[[Battle of Five Armies (disambiguation)]]}}[[File:The Hobbit - The Battle of the Five Armies - Extended Edition - Blur-ray cover.jpg|250px|thumb|right|Blu-ray cover of the Extended Edition{{sequence |prev=[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug (extended edition)|The Desolation of Smaug Extended Edition]] |next=- |list=The Hobbit Extended Edition
The Battle of the Five Armies }}]] '''''The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies'' (extended edition)''' is an extended version of ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]''. It has 20 minutes of additional footage added back into the film (bringing its total running time up to 164 minutes), as well as multiple documentaries about the making of the film as supplements. [[File:The Hobbit - The Battle of the Five Armies - Extended Edition - DVD cover.jpg|150px|right|thumb|DVD cover]] ==Special Extended Edition (disc 1)== The first disc contains the extended version of the film with the following audio commentary: * [[Peter Jackson]] and [[Philippa Boyens]] NOTE: The film is split over 2 discs for both the DVD and Blu-ray 3-D editions; the breaking point coming between chapters 27 & 28 (the Blu-ray 3-D edition also contains the regular 2-D Blu-ray version of the film as disc 3). ===New Scenes=== * 20. The Night Watch * 33. The War Chariot * 38. An Unforeseen Remedy * 45. King Under the Mountain ===Extended Scenes=== * 2. Bard the Dragon-slayer * 9. Attack on Dol Guldur * 10. "Summon Our Friends" * 14. The Elven-king's Aid * 22. An Honest Burglar * 23. Dáin Ironfoot * 24. The Clouds Burst * 26. The Darkest Hour * 30. "To the King!" * 31. A Call to Arms * 32. Thorin's Plan * 34. Courage and Cowardice * 40. The Battle at Ravenhill * 41. To the Death ==The Appendices: Part Eleven - The Gathering Storm: The Chronicles of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' - Part 3 (disc 2)**== * Opening* * "In the Dungeons of the [[Sauron#Sauron's Return|Necromancer]]" Documentary* * "Fire and Water" Documentary* * "Under the Shadow of the Mountain" Documentary* * "In the Wake of the [[Dragons|Dragon]]" Documentary* * "The Gathering of the Clouds" Documentary* * "Many Partings" Documentary* * "The Clouds Burst" Documentary^ * "A Last Desperate Stand" Documentary^ * "Out from the Gate" Documentary^ * "The Last Stage" Documentary^ * Credits^ [[File:The Hobbit - The Battle of the Five Armies - Extended Edition - Blu-ray 3-D cover.jpg|150px|right|thumb|Blu-ray 3-D cover]] ==The Appendices: Part Twelve - Here at Journey's End (disc 3)^^== * "Beneath the Thunder: Forging a [[Battle of Five Armies]]" Documentary^ ** A Master Plan, Long in the Making ** On the Front Lines of a Virtual Battlefield ** Turning the Tide * "The Peoples and Denizens of [[Middle-earth]]" Documentaryº ** [[Tauriel]]: Daughter of the Forest ** [[Thranduil]]: King of Wood and Stone ** [[Dáin Ironfoot]]: [[Lord of the Iron Hills|Lord]] of the [[Iron Hills]] * "Realms of the [[Third Age]]: From the City of [[Dale]] to the Halls of [[Lonely Mountain|Erebor]]" Documentaryº ** Dale: The City of Men ** [[Dol Guldur]]: The Hill of Sorcery ** Erebor: The [[Lonely Mountain]] * "Farewell, Friends!" Documentaryº * "[[Andrew Lesnie]] Remembered" Documentaryº * Creditsº NOTE: * - Item is on disc 3 of DVD edition ^ - Item is on disc 4 of DVD edition º - Item is on disc 5 of DVD edition ** - Is actually disc 4 of Blu-ray 3-D edition ^^ - Is actually disc 5 of Blu-ray 3-D edition ==See also== * ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'' * [[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey (extended edition)|''The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey'' (extended edition)]] * [[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug (extended edition)|''The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug'' (extended edition)]] * [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (extended edition)]] * [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'' (extended edition)]] * [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (extended edition)]] {{hobbitfilms}} {{title|italics}} [[Category:The Hobbit (film series)]] [[Category:The Hobbit (film series) DVDs]]
